attrs.name: label
attrs.desc: Selected value (This parameter is valid only when checkbox-group or the bound object type is array.)

attrs.name: false-label
attrs.desc: Value when no option is selected

attrs.name: disabled
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: border
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: size
attrs.desc: Checkbox size. This parameter is valid only when border is set to true. The optional values of this attribute are medium / small / mini

attrs.name: checked
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: indeterminate
attrs.desc: Sets the indeterminate state and controls only the style.
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

attrs.name: text
attrs.desc: Text displayed in the check box
attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is null.

events.name: change
events.desc: This event is triggered when the binding value changes.

checkbox-button-attrs.name: label
checkbox-button-attrs.desc: Value in the selected state (This parameter is valid only when checkbox-group or the bound object type is array.) The optional value of this attribute is medium-

checkbox-button-attrs.name: false-label
checkbox-button-attrs.desc: Value when no option is selected

checkbox-button-attrs.name: disabled
checkbox-button-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

checkbox-button-attrs.name: text
checkbox-button-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is Function.

checkbox-button-attrs.name: checked
checkbox-button-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

checkbox-group-attrs.name: size
checkbox-group-attrs.desc: Size of the check box group. This parameter is valid only for the check box with buttons or borders. The optional values of this attribute are medium / small / mini

checkbox-group-attrs.name: disabled
checkbox-group-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

checkbox-group-attrs.name: min
checkbox-group-attrs.desc: Minimum number of checkboxes that can be selected

checkbox-group-attrs.name: max
checkbox-group-attrs.desc: Maximum number of checkboxes that can be selected

checkbox-group-attrs.name: text-color
checkbox-group-attrs.desc: Text color when the checkbox in button mode is activated
checkbox-group-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is #ffffff.

checkbox-group-attrs.name: fill
checkbox-group-attrs.desc: Fill color and border color when the checkbox in button mode is activated
checkbox-group-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is #409EFF

checkbox-group-attrs.name: type
checkbox-group-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is checkbox, which is used together with the options attribute.

checkbox-group-attrs.name: vertical
checkbox-group-attrs.desc: Set the component arrangement mode. Sets whether the check boxes are arranged vertically. The value of this attribute can be true or false
checkbox-group-attrs.defaultValue: The default value of this attribute is false.

checkbox-group-events.name: change
checkbox-group-events.desc: This event is triggered when the binding value changes.
